description: Our story is straightforward. We love to eat awesome food and delicious burgers, and like you are sick of the usual. Fortunately, you won't need to suffer any longer. OG Original Grass-Fed Burgers are easily the most unique and delicious burgers you will ever find, anywhere in the world. We combine the freshest local ingredients with the most amazing worldly recipes to bring you the ultimate burger experience.It all starts with your ingredients; Use the best and you will be the best! OG Burgers are made from the juiciest, most tasty grass-fed beef Colorado has to brag about. Always free from synthetic hormones, antibiotics, and unkind practices, our cows are happy snacking outdoors on yummy natural grass. Top it with the freshest and most creative local toppings.Chef/Owners Zach and Gil present to you the newest class of eating ... "FARM -TO- BUN"OG Burgers proudly supports local and sustainable farming efforts as well as your personal rights to eat delicious and nutritious.
name: OG Burgers
